name: RISKISR
description:
WASD to move slowly and LEFT CLICK to teleport - this spawns a bomb that moves towards you, so move quickly or get something between you and your original position!

Made in roughly 25 hours from October 1 - 4, 2021 for Ludum Dare 49.

No art or sound for this one - time management and being honest with myself earlier on still needs work.
